content:
Grah! I am annoyed about #5859 "chore: re-port Init.Function" which restored @[reducible] to Function.Surjective, implicitly reverting #5063, thereby preventing simp using any lemmas with Surjective side conditions.

I guess thankfully we are done "re-porting".

I fixed this once already, and just wasted some time debugging something and missing that this was the root cause because I knew I'd already fixed it.
On the plus side, at least you got to the bottom of it :-) Thanks!
It then inspired me to go on a spree of "let's see if adding @[simp] is okay here" PRs, which are wending their way through CI now. :-)
